title: Update BuildCraft site to match https://buildcraft.co.in/ reference

requirements.text: Review https://buildcraft.co.in/ and update the current site’s public-facing pages to closely match the reference website’s information architecture (section order, section presence, navigation labels/anchors) and overall layout, while keeping the existing single-page section-scroll structure where feasible.

quotes: https://buildcraft.co.in/ PLEASE Refer this website and for updation

acceptanceCriteria: Primary navigation links/labels and section anchors match the reference site’s structure as closely as possible within the current app architecture
All header and footer links scroll to the correct on-page sections without broken anchors
No placeholder/ocean-themed content remains visible anywhere on the public site

requirements.text: Update brand styling to visually align with https://buildcraft.co.in/ (construction/industrial feel), applying consistent typography, spacing, button styles, card styles, and section backgrounds across the site using Tailwind/global styles and section/component composition (do not edit immutable UI component sources).

quotes: PLEASE Refer this website and for updation

acceptanceCriteria: Site uses a coherent construction-themed visual system consistently across header, hero, section blocks, cards, and CTAs
All pages/sections remain readable with sufficient contrast and responsive behavior from mobile to desktop
No edits are made to any paths listed as immutable in SYSTEM_CONTEXT

requirements.text: Align all user-facing marketing content (company name, hero messaging, about text, services, projects, testimonials, contact copy) with the content presented on https://buildcraft.co.in/ and ensure all user-facing text is in English.

quotes: PLEASE Refer this website and for updation

acceptanceCriteria: All displayed company/marketing content matches the reference site’s messaging (adapted into clear English where needed)
Content is stored/managed via the existing structured content source (site content module) rather than being hard-coded across many components
No truncated or cut-off strings appear in any section (hero, about, services, projects, testimonials, contact)

requirements.text: Ensure the site uses the specified construction-themed static image assets (logos and section imagery) from frontend/public/assets/generated and that all existing references (header, footer, hero, about, contact, SEO/social image) correctly point to these files.

quotes: PLEASE Refer this website and for updation

acceptanceCriteria: Header and footer render the horizontal logo; favicon/small usage renders the icon logo; social sharing metadata uses the social banner image
Hero/background and section images render without broken links and do not rely on video assets
All image references are served as static assets from frontend/public/assets/generated (not via backend endpoints)

requirements.text: Verify and update SEO-facing metadata to align with https://buildcraft.co.in/ branding (title/description/OG where applicable) while preserving existing search console verification files, robots.txt, sitemap.xml, and manifest functionality.

quotes: PLEASE Refer this website and for updation

acceptanceCriteria: Page title and meta description reflect BuildCraft construction branding aligned to the reference site
OG/Twitter/social image points to the generated social banner asset
Existing verification files in frontend/public remain present and unchanged

requirements.text: Keep the existing inquiry submission flow functional end-to-end: the Contact form must submit name, email, phone, selected service type, and message to the Motoko backend and show clear success/error states in English.

quotes: PLEASE Refer this website and for updation

acceptanceCriteria: Submitting the contact form successfully persists an inquiry in the backend with all fields populated
Validation errors are shown inline for missing/invalid fields (name/email/phone/service/message)
On success, the confirmation state/message displays in English and the form resets

requirements.text: Maintain admin-restricted inquiry management behavior: only admins can fetch all inquiries and inquiry count; public users/guests can submit inquiries without authentication.

quotes: PLEASE Refer this website and for updation

acceptanceCriteria: Unauthenticated/guest users can call submitInquiry successfully
Non-admin callers are rejected when calling getAllInquiries and getInquiryCount
Admin callers can retrieve stored inquiries and count without errors

constraints: Backend must remain a single Motoko actor with all logic in backend/main.mo
Do not edit frontend immutable paths listed in SYSTEM_CONTEXT (compose existing UI components instead)
Do not remove or modify existing Google Search Console verification HTML files in frontend/public
Do not introduce external databases, third-party auth providers, or unsupported backend/frontend frameworks
nonGoals: Adding real-time chat, web sockets, push notifications, or email/SMS integrations
Integrating third-party authentication beyond Internet Identity
Introducing a new multi-canister/microservices backend architecture
Adding external CMS or external database storage

Construction company square icon logo, simplified mark (buildcraft-logo-icon.dim_256x256.png)
Construction company social sharing banner with logo and subtle texture (buildcraft-logo-social.dim_512x256.png)
Construction hero background photo/illustration of modern building site with warm light and subtle overlay-friendly composition (construction-hero-bg.dim_2400x1350.jpg)
Subtle construction texture background (concrete/blueprint/steel pattern), low-contrast (construction-section-texture.dim_2400x1200.png)
About section image showing professional construction team on-site (construction-about-team.dim_1600x900.jpg)
Contact section image showing tools/blueprints/architecture desk scene (construction-contact-support.dim_1600x900.jpg)
